mainDescription: is a full stack Framework for PHP
mission: Improve your development and build a modern website in minutes

featuresDescriptions.fast: Boostack is a full stack framework for PHP built for developers who need a simple layer to create modern website in minutes.
featuresDescriptions.freedom: No naming conventions, use your own coding and naming. Boostack is a minimal layer of code that lets you use your creativity.
featuresDescriptions.simplicity: Boostack is a lightweight and flexible framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
featuresDescriptions.seo: Boostack integrate SEO features for meta data: rich snippets, openGraph, internal linking, schema markup, social media and more.
featuresDescriptions.extensible: Create your project with Boostack framework and start coding. Extend all php classes and build quickly simple or complex web-based apps.
featuresDescriptions.secure: Built on PHP - MySql - HTML5 - CSS3 - JQuery Boostack runs on secure and fast-loading code for optimal performance.

inclusions2: It contains JQuery, Animate.css and Bootstrap.

download.howtoDescription:
Boostack is available open-source under the MIT license.
We recommend using the latest version of PHP and Mysql (Boostack allows you to develop even without using Mysql).
download.downloaditDescription:
Option 1: Get the latest official version
You can download HERE a zipped file of the development version.

Option 2: Get the latest development version
The latest and greatest Boostack version is the one that’s in our Git repository (https://github.com/offmania9/Boostack).
This is only for experienced users who want to try incoming changes and help identify bugs before an official release.
Get it using this shell command, which requires Git: git clone https://github.com/offmania9/Boostack.git
download.afterDescription: See the Documentation for further instructions.

error.urlnotfound: The requested URL was not found on this server.
